TLDR

  • Automated routines such as fetching AWS Cloudwatch logs with multiple filters and querying and fetching files from AWS S3 bucket.
  • Used boto3 and Flask in Python3 for serving REST APIs on React.js frontend.
  • The above 2 projects reduced the average retreival time from 3 hours to approx. 7 minutes.

Long version

Some other time maybe?
